name: Kimola Veri Teknolojileri A.S.
description: Developer of a consumer research platform designed to provide audience-specific trends and lifestyle insights. The company's platform uses an artificial intelligence engine to profile consumers anonymously and detect the language and emotions of a text block, extract entities, and search within a large volume of unstructured text data, enabling marketers to build better marketing strategies, optimize media buying and increase return on investment with insights.
